name: Week#11 Stealth Game
description:
Movement: Left/Right Arrow to rotate and Up Arrow to move

You are a ninja that is sent to assassinate the purple dude. Get to him undetected. 

Week11: 29.10-7.11.2018  

Constraints:  Learn about mesh creation and simple AI 

Core Dynamic: Stealth

Summary: First idea was for the game to be a stealth game with logic puzzles. In the end I got a little sick, and despite having the idea sorted - I guess I hadn't thought it enough. Struggling a bit about what do I want to do I ended up deciding on what I want to learn during this project. By deciding on toying with custom mesh creation, simple paroling AI and tile system (which I ended up discarding) I finally started the real work. 

What went bad: I didn't thought through the idea at the beginning of the week - instead I started to work as Arnold Schwarzenegger says in his speech "you can have the best ship but without specific purpose you will be drifting around" - and that is what has happened. Lesson learned - I will sit and think and only when everything is decided I will start doing. 

What went good: For the first time since the week#5 Western I had fun when creating the enemies, figuring out how to make mesh and especially adding sounds as the last touch.
